name: Classic Chicken Fried Rice
description: A savory and satisfying fried rice loaded with tender chicken pieces, fluffy rice, and aromatic garlic.

name: Garlic Butter Pasta
description: Simple yet elegant pasta tossed in golden garlic butter with a generous sprinkle of parmesan.

description: Crisp-tender vegetables wok-fried with aromatic garlic and ginger in a savory sauce.

name: Scrambled Eggs on Toast
description: Fluffy scrambled eggs served on crispy buttered toast - a breakfast classic.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Rich and aromatic curry with tender chicken pieces simmered in creamy coconut sauce.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Creamy mashed avocado on artisan toast with a bright squeeze of lemon.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef in warm tortillas topped with fresh vegetables and creamy cheese.

name: Vegetable Omelette
description: Fluffy eggs filled with colorful sautéed vegetables and melted cheese.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Golden crispy bread with perfectly melted cheese - comfort food at its finest.

name: Tofu Stir Fry

name: Chicken Quesadilla
description: Crispy tortilla filled with seasoned chicken, melted cheese, and sautéed peppers.

name: Greek Salad

name: Banana Pancakes

description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in spicy garlic butter with a bright lemon finish.

description: Creamy Italian rice dish with earthy mushrooms and rich parmesan.

name: Egg Fried Noodles

name: Caprese Salad
description: Classic Italian salad with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and fragrant basil.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, crunchy croutons, and creamy caesar dressing.

description: Smooth, creamy hummus served with warm pita bread for dipping.

name: French Toast

name: Beef Stir Fry
description: Tender beef strips with crisp broccoli in a savory ginger-garlic sauce.

description: Hearty and comforting soup loaded with garden vegetables.
